import React,{useState} from 'react'; export default function WordInput({onSubmit,lastLetter,currentPlayer}){const [word,setWord]=useState(''); function handle(e){e.preventDefault(); onSubmit(word); setWord('');} return (

Player {currentPlayer+1}'s turn

Must start with: {lastLetter || 'any'}

setWord(e.target.value)} placeholder='Enter word'/>
); }
